overview: Peter is an entrepreneur with 17 years of experience in starting and growing businesses from the ground up. As founder and president of the Plainpeak Group (http://www.plainpeak.com), Peter has consulted for several Fortune 500 companies such as DamilerChrysler, SAP and BASF and large public sector organizations such as the Government of Alberta (Canada) as well as countless small and medium-sized businesses. His primary fields of expertise are strategic marketing, corporate communication, business process development, web applications, web portal and intranet solutions.
